data.name: 魔物娘捕获大陆-日版
data.detailed_description: This DLC has added Chinese content and the island of zhiniang. There are new ways to obtain magic Niang and different color magic Niang.
data.about_the_game: This DLC has added Chinese content and the island of zhiniang. There are new ways to obtain magic Niang and different color magic Niang.
data.short_description: This DLC has added Chinese content and the island of zhiniang. There are new ways to obtain magic Niang and different color magic Niang.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
-Naked or pornographic content
-Not suitable for viewing at work
-Content not suitable for all ages
-The characters in the game are over 18 years old
